Title: Handwritten Digit Recognition
Description: This project is a neural network-based solution for recognizing handwritten digits using the MNIST dataset. The implementation leverages TensorFlow and Keras for building and training the model.
Features: Data Preprocessing: Normalization and reshaping of images for model compatibility.
Model Architecture: A sequential model with convolutional, pooling, and dense layers.
Training: Model trained on the MNIST dataset with validation split.
Evaluation: Performance evaluated using accuracy and loss metrics.
Visualization: Training history visualized using Matplotlib.

Title: Customer Satisfaction Rating System
Description: Using fuzzy logic, the system assesses customer satisfaction based on various parameters such as service quality, food quality, and ambiance. The fuzzy inference system processes these inputs to provide a more accurate and human-like evaluation of customer satisfaction.
Features: Input Parameters: Service quality, food quality, and ambiance ratings.
Fuzzy Inference: Processes inputs using fuzzy logic rules.
Output: Provides a customer satisfaction score.

Title: Personal Portfolio V1
Description: Developed my first personal portfolio. simple html, tailwindcss , and Javascript
Features: Responsive Design: Adapts to various screen sizes and devices.
Smooth Scrolling: Enhances user experience with smooth scrolling effects.
Interactive Elements: Includes buttons and links with hover effects.

Title: Sukishiro
Description: Showcases the UI/UX design for SUKISHIRO, an anime streaming platform with a built-in community feature.
Features: Modern UI Design: Clean and intuitive interface design
Community Features: Built-in social features for anime fans
Responsive Layout: Optimized for mobile and desktop viewing
User Experience: Seamless navigation and content discovery

Title: Seismo-Track
Description: Indonesia Earthquake map by utilizing mapbox, vite, react. Providing realtime data from BMKG
Features: Real-time Data: Displays live earthquake data from BMKG.
Interactive Map: Utilizes Mapbox for an interactive map experience.
Responsive Design: Adapts to various screen sizes and devices.
